title: I didn't get my piltover icon even when it said I did?

replies.body:
The [**Piltover Promo Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/piltover#champion-tales) specifically mentions:

> **"Icons will be granted up to two weeks after December 13, 2016 at 23:59 PT."**

If you don't have the Icon by December 27th, please let us know in a [**support ticket.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) ^.^
